Test

This is a fenced code block with language specification:

public class Foo() {
	public Foo(bar) {
		System.out.println(bar);
	}
}

This is one without language specification:


	public class Foo() {
	public Foo(bar) {
		System.out.println(bar);
	}
}

This a indented code block:

public class Foo() {
	public Foo(bar) {
		System.out.println(bar);
	}
}
